title: Lawyer Oleksandr Kravchuk
description: Professional lawyer in Novovolynsk with experience in commercial, family, criminal, civil, and administrative cases. We also offer subscription-based legal services for businesses, institutions, organizations, and local government. We guarantee high-quality services and an individual approach to each client.
